text: Mariyu variki ma spastamaina sucana (ayat) lanu vinipimpa jesinappudu varu: "I vyakti kevalam mi tandri tatalu aradhince vati nundi mim'malni nirodhistunnadu." Ani antaru. Varinka ila antaru: "Idi (i khur'an) kevalam kalpincabadina butakam matrame." Mariyu satyatiraskarulu, satyam vari munduku vaccinappudu: "Idi kevalam spastamaina mantrajalam matrame!" Ani antaru
